page.title: 05Education
page.content: {Ysgol Y Creuddyn The school was opened in 1981 and is the only Bilingual Secondary State School in {Aberconwy. }It is a co_educational school where all subjects apart from French and English are taught through the medium of Welsh.There are 511 pupils(11_18years) {Ysgol Glanwydden The school is a state primary,built in 1910 with 130 pupils(boys and girls 3_11 years).The main subjects taught are English,Mathematics and Welsh. {St.David's College This is a private residential + day school for boys(11_18 years) housed in {Gloddaeth Hall.}There are 235 pupils, many from abroad.The school offers the usual academic subjects but has a sporting tradition(Canoeing,Watersking ,Parachuting,Orienteering etc.).
